post-install-output: 1. Install the JavaScript dependencies by running <comment>yarn add @api-platform/admin @babel/preset-react</comment>
* Mark entities you want in the admin with the <comment>@ApiResource</comment> annotation, it appears in the admin!

config/routes/api_platform_admin.yaml.contents:
admin:
    path: /admin
    controller: Symfony\Bundle\FrameworkBundle\Controller\TemplateController
    defaults:
        template: admin.html.twig
